examples.example: 我怀着激动的心情推开了梦想的大门。

translate.english: I pushed open the door of my dream with excitement.

examples.example: 当我推开那扇知识的大门，就仿佛进入了一个全新的世界。

translate.english: When I pushed open that door of knowledge, it seemed as if I had entered a brand new world.

examples.example: 我微笑着推开希望的大门，迎接美好的未来。

translate.english: I smile and push open the door of hope to welcome the beautiful future.
